snippet: “Pawel Althamer: The Neighbors” is a stirring career survey of this Polish artist’s work at the New Museum, and is very much about both community and impermanence.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews exhibit of works by Polish artist Pawel Althamer at New Museum.
lead_paragraph: “Pawel Althamer: The Neighbors” is a stirring career survey of this Polish artist’s work at the New Museum, and is very much about both community and impermanence.

headline.print_headline: Global Citizens, Bound by Soul and Sinew
headline.seo: ‘Pawel Althamer: The Neighbors’ Is at the New Museum
headline.main: Global Citizens, Bound by Soul and Sinew
